summary: The mod adds some well needed fortifications to Hearthfire\'s Lakeview Manor. Includes stockade walls, gates, watchtowers and guards, as well as some miscellaneous improvements to the property.
descriptionHtml:
==================
Hearthfire Fortified: Lakeview Manor
==================

By Greg147
June 2013

1. Description
2. Requirements

===============
1. DESCRIPTION
===============

Hearthfire Fortified is a mod series that aims to give the Hearthfire homes some well needed protection whilst maintaining lore and realism. This .esp focuses on Lakeview Manor. Located in a heavily forested area, lumber is easy to come by, and so this is reflected in the defences.

- A perimeter stockade has been added, complete with a main gatehouse and two side gates.
- Two guard towers have been added, north and south. The northern one replaces the alter and necromancer, and has its own walls.
- Three guards will now man these towers.
- The pond to the south has been removed and has been replaced with a road leading up to the main entrance.
- The dead woodcutter has been removed.
- A small pier and rowing boat have been added on the lake.

This mod simply adds the fortifications; you do not need to build them yourselves. Therefore, it is advised to build most of the exterior of your home before installing the mod. 

Update: Version 1.01 changes:

- Conjuration books found at the alter has been placed at the southern outpost
- Random spawn point near walls has been removed

Thanks to larade and ssconvert for the bug reports.

===============
2. Requirements
===============

Requires the Hearthfire DLC.

RECOMENDED MODS:
This plugin is compatible with any guard mods I have tried, so any of those are recommended. I personally use this one:


Guards on Your home -hearthfire- by Abram1
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25140/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D25140%26preview%3D&pUp=1

========================
3. INSTALLING THE PLUGIN
========================

Extract the HeartfireFortifiedLakeviewManor.esp file to your \'Skyrim/Data\' folder

=====================
4. PLAYING THE PLUGIN
=====================

From the Skyrim Launcher, select Data Files and check the box next to the (HeartfireFortifiedLakeviewManor.esp)

===============
5. SAVE GAMES
===============

This mod should be save game compatible.

============================
6. CONFLICTS / KNOWN ERRORS
============================

This mod will conflict with any others that alter the surroundings of Lakeview Manor. 

================================

================================

==========================
8. CONTACT AND INFORMATION

=========================
9. LEGAL STUFF/ DISCLAIMER
=========================

it\'s going.


I hold no responsibility for any damages this mod may cause.
